contest-event.event-date:
July 25, 1908 D Bulwell Contest
Bulwell Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
bulwell-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Bulwell, Nottinghamshire March contest - 1st Sheffield Recreation, 2nd Hornby Temperance. Best soprano - Bentinck Colliery. Best trombone and euphonium - Hornsby Temperance. Best horn - Derby United. Best cornet and Basses - Mansfield Excelsior. Prizes - 1st £5, 2nd £2.10s., 3rd £1.10s., 4th 15s. 8 bands competed.
Sept. 24, 2018, 8:41 a.m. Sept. 24, 2018, 8:52 a.m.
1 Mansfield Excelsior F. Suttle Daughter of the Regiment [unknown arranger]
2 Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) Harry Kelly Daughter of the Regiment [unknown arranger]
3 Derby United James Haywood Daughter of the Regiment [unknown arranger]
4 Derby Sax and Tuba H. Little The Lily of Killarney [arr. Godfrey]
